professional_summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years in full-stack development, specializing in scalable web applications and cloud infrastructure.

responsibilities: Lead development of microservices architecture using Django and React
Design and implement scalable microservices handling 1M+ requests/day
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Collaborate with product managers to define technical roadmaps

Led team of 5 developers on critical project that increased user retention by 35%
Reduced deployment time by 50% implementing comprehensive CI/CD pipeline
Achieved 99.9% uptime for production services through robust monitoring

Increased user engagement by 25% through improved UX and performance
Implemented automated testing reducing production bugs by 30%
Scaled application to handle 10x user growth
